Sitting in the my chair and pumping my legs as if me running would help me get away from the killer only to have him close on me and hit me so hard that i do a back flip only to have him pick me up and stick me on a giant meat hook.
half the gameplay is spewing hate on the internet

I really, really want to like this game. I do like it, just not as much as I had hoped. This game is based upon a genius premise, a horror game with/ against other players, however, the execution of this brilliant idea is not best expressed by Dead by Daylight. Allow me to make a lis t of Pros and Cons.
Pros:
-Interesting Idea
-Good Story and Level Design
-Iconic Killer Micheal Meyers
-Base price is reasonable

Cons:
-Glitches and Bugs EVERYWHERE
-Graphics are good for a PS2
-Bad Animations
-Lack of creativity for survivor character design 
-Pricey DLC that should have been free (Blood Sack and 80s Suitcase)
-Gameplay gets repetitive

I still enjoy this game, but these devs need to fix some serious isssues. I will continue to have high hopes for this games future, but right now, jus keep it stored on your wishlist.

[i] High Rank Lobby Simulator from 2016... The game is very interesting & atmosphire, but in game a lot of toxic survariors groups when you killer... Also killer's rare nice & fair when you play "solo"... Game are still good if ignore big toxic community part & play for own fun... <3

P.s At this moment i quit from game till anti-cheat will be fixed or new dlc will out....
im writing this because of the steam awards

For a game that never got the publicity that it should have, backed by a group of developers and creators that listen and communicate great with their community, Dead by Daylight has brought the horror genre back into the light. Although the game has its bugs and faults (looking at you infinite abusers), the game is different every single match and leaves you either bloodthirsty, or scared for your life. I would highly recommend picking this game up and give it a shot. 10/10.
It's so fcking awesome to play this game becuase this game is very huanting.
The "scare the living crap outta your friends" simulator.

Esta bien shidoris! <3 

Aunque lo mas divertido son sus bugs,  lo mejor es jugar con amigos !
This game can be addictive, especially with friends!

El juego a pesar de lo que digan muchos jugadores, esta bastante balanceado (tengo casi tantas horas de asesino como de superviviente).
El GRAN problema es que siguen habiendo bastantes bugs, problemas por fallas de sincronizaciÃ³n (la clÃ¡sica que saltas el palet o ventana y te pegan del otro lado xD), y lo mas molesto y triste a mi gusto... un juego con AÃ‘OS, ya no estamos en apha o beta, el juego tiene VARIOS AÃ‘OS... aun no tienen un sistema para armar grupos que funcione aceptable, no digo bien, solo pido que sea aceptable... Tener que reiniciar el juego casi literalmente despuÃ©s de cada partida, es extremadamente molesto. Hay juegos que desde el beta ya tienen esto bien armado.
O jogo precisa de alguns ajustes ainda, o killer estÃ¡ muito em desvantagem em relaÃ§Ã£o aos sobreviventes. Mas Ã© um bom jogo!
WHY KILLERS ALWAYS HAVE TO CHOICE ME!!! <3
gg el juego esta muy bien aunque aun hay asesinos un poco malos
jogo muito bom faz voce querer jg mais e mais

Sooooooooooooo scary!
...and fun (Doesn't take forever to get in a game anymore)

*****(Now updating on 7/20/2022. sadly after this update i have to update my review to say they ruined the game. Killer buffs way too strong and nerfed survivors. Game over man, game over man)
It was a really good and funny game, I really enjoy playing it.

I Loved the game when the game doesn't have the MMR system, There is a surprise element for whom will you'll compete with, but now with the MMR system is ON, I always get the survivors the have the same build, same tactics, same gameplay(I main Killer)... MMR system making the game less enjoyable on casual player like me. I hope they change the MMR system or just remove it to the game...

Ein extrem sÃ¼chtig machendes Spiel, bei dem man zuerst denkt, dass hier bald die Luft raus ist, doch dann packt es einen immer wieder aufs Neue und man merkt, wie man von Spielstunde zu Spielstunde immer besser wird. Dead by Daylight Ã¼berzeugt mit einem bislang einzigartigem Konzept. Da kann man auch Ã¼ber den ein oder anderen Bug hinwegsehen :)

Update 24.11.2017: RegelmÃ¤ÃŸige Updates und DLCs mit neuen Killern und Ãœberlebenden bringen frischen WInd in das Spiel und somit macht das Spiel auch nach Ã¼ber einem Jahr noch sehr viel SpaÃŸ :)

Update 21.11.2018: Mit dem jÃ¼ngsten Patch macht das Spielen als Ãœberlebender kaum noch SpaÃŸ. Von Tunnlern abgesehen, wurden die Ãœberlebenden massiv generft, sodass man kaum noch entkommt.
I had so much fun with this i'm thinking of upgrading my pc to make the game look better
Worth the money, you can get  many hours of enjoyable play time out of this game. It does take time to learn and get good at, once you get past that bump as a new player it is very fun.

I can't recommend this game in good conscience. It used to be an amazing game, was a lot of fun. The game is in the worst state it has ever been.

if you want to get hit through windows, over pallets, through walls because dedicated servers are terrible... this is the game for you.

It's like they don't even listen to their own playerbase and are just trying to money grab. I am so disappointed in the current state of the game.

After almost 6300 hours I literally ONLY play this game now for friends. I will not play it solo, solo is absolutely miserable in this game. Your teammates hide in corners all game or just sit on gens and don't save. I miss the old days of this game. It just isn't the same anymore.

Try it during a free weekend. I don't recommend the $20 pricetag. 




ORIGINAL REVIEW (I'll leave this here for old times sake when the game was amazing):This game is amazing. It has it's goods and bads but I would still highly recommend it. 

I've been facecamped, mori'd, dududu'd, and all manner of stuff in between but I still keep coming back. 

10/10 would get mori'd again.

This is one of those games where the core of it is something that's genuinely pretty new to the industry - and it's insanely fun. It's Horror Hide N Seek, and while the "horror" aspect may be well gone for the more seasoned players, it's lost none of the fun aspect.

The learning curve for this game can be pretty rough, but my god if it isn't a great ride. Definitely one of those "Just one more" kind of games. There's also the capability of playing with up to 3 friends (4 if you want to host a lobby, forfeiting  progress on your characters), meaning there's all kinds of fun to be had with a group. One of the nicest parts of this semi-competitive game is that if you become sick of being shafted by the other side... Just switch sides! Takes all of a few seconds.

If you're looking for a new addiction, or are just buying into the hype, you won't be disappointed.
